SeekBarPreference.app:summary: Converts each pixel's value greater than this to black and less than to white. Recommended to increase this in increments of 5 when Tesseract fails for better accuracy. Default is 230.
SeekBarPreference.app:title: Adjust Threshold for Image Processing

CheckBoxPreference.app:summary:
[Experimental Feature]
Enables automatic retrying of OCR by incrementing threshold value by 5 whenever it fails until it succeeds or it hits the max of 255.

Increases processing time by several seconds with worst case scenario being ~10 seconds at Threshold Value of 200.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Enable Automatic Retry

SeekBarPreference.app:summary: Set the minimum confidence required for OCR to succeed and display the result. Default is 80.
SeekBarPreference.app:title: Adjust Minimum Confidence

CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Hides the log messages regarding the string comparison process.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Hide String Comparison Results
